        <span class="lgsearch">

         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

             &nbsp;&nbsp;Search:&nbsp;
            </div>

             &nbsp;
            </div>

    <div id="commentslistp2894859" style="display:none; margin:0px 10px;">

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10140609">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10140609">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10140609">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Defining Key Terms
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10140609">
          <p>
           You may be wondering what we mean when we refer to
           <em>
            scholarly
           </em>
           versus
           <em>
            popular
           </em>
           .
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <strong>
             Scholarly:
            </strong>
            In-depth, research-based articles, books, and book chapters, written by scholars and experts and intended for other researchers, experts, and students.
           </li>
           <li>
            <strong>
             Popular:
            </strong>
            Articles, books, and book chapters written by journalists or professional writers for a general audience in common language (e.g., newspapers and magazines).
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p style="padding-left: 30px;" class="MsoNormal">
           <em>
            Learn more:
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=4047073">
             What is Scholarly?
            </a>
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
           While we're at it, how about a few more key terms...
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <strong>
             Empirical:
            </strong>
            Based on experiment or observation
            <strong>
             .
             <br />
            </strong>
           </li>
           <li>
            <strong>
             Peer-Reviewed:
            </strong>
            A process through which some scholarly articles and book chapters are critically evaluated by experts with in-depth knowledge of the research area before publication in order to ensure the information is valid, credible, well-written, and of high quality.
            <span>
             &nbsp;
            </span>
            <strong>
            </strong>
           </li>
           <li>
            <strong>
             Literature:
            </strong>
            Scholarly articles, books, and book chapters published on a particular subject.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt10140609" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10173314">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10173314">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10173314">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Verifying Peer-Review
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10173314">
          <p>
           Are you looking especially for
           <strong>
            peer-reviewed
           </strong>
           articles?&nbsp;
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            Many databases will tell you if an article has been peer-reviewed.&nbsp; You may even be able to use limits or filters in the database to narrow your search results.&nbsp;
           </li>
           <li>
            If you're still not sure if an article has been peer-reviewed, search the name of the journal in which the article was published in
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com/">
             Ulrichsweb Periodicals Directory
            </a>
            .&nbsp; The symbol of a referee's jersey next to the journal name indicates the journal uses peer review.&nbsp; (Refereed is a synonym for peer reviewed.)&nbsp; Note, though, that not all content in peer-reviewed journals is actually peer-reviewed; book or film reviews, letters to the editors, opinion columns, and articles without references are typically not peer-reviewed.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt10173314" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10140312">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10140312">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10140312">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Databases for Scholarly Literature
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10140312">
          <div id="boxatt10140312" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12334932">
              <a id="link_12334932" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=psyh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12334932,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12326504}); ">
               PsycINFO
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier database of scholarly and professional journals and books in psychology and related areas.  Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12334934">
              <a id="link_12334934" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.sciencedirect.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12334934,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12326851}); ">
               ScienceDirect College Edition Health and Life Sciences, Physical Sciences
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals published by Elsevier in the areas of health, life, and physical sciences.  Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, search Encompass Search by journal titles to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10719765">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10719765">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10719765">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Using Encompass Search for Scholarly and Popular Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10719765">
          <p>
           Encompass Search finds information by searching through a massive collection of books and scholarly journals, as well as newspapers and magazines, dissertations, conference proceedings, music, video, maps, and more.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10719765" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link13011281">
              <a id="link_13011281" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(13011281,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13011281}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To find only articles, use the Article limit on the left sidebar of your search results page.  Use the Peer-reviewed limit to narrow further to scholarly sources that have been peer-reviewed.  Some full text is linked directly; otherwise, use the Access Online buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10140320">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10140320">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10140320">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Other Recommended Databases for Scholarly Literature
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10140320">
          <div id="boxatt10140320" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12335038">
              <a id="link_12335038" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12335038,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas, including psychology.  Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12335152">
              <a id="link_12335152" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/assiashell/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12335152,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335152}); ">
               ASSIA: Applied Social Sciences Index and Abstracts
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Citations to scholarly journals in sociology, psychology, political science, health, social work, education, and more.  Use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12335220">
              <a id="link_12335220" href="http://cogprints.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12335220,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335220}); ">
               CogPrints
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of self-archived journal articles, book chapters, conference papers and posters, and more regarding cognition in areas of psychology, neuroscience, and linguistics, as well as computer science, philosophy, biology, medicine, and anthropology.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12335257">
              <a id="link_12335257" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=eric" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12335257,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335240}); ">
               ERIC
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly and professional journals, books, documents, and more in education and related areas, including psychology.  Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12364481">
              <a id="link_12364481" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12364481,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364481}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals for most academic disciplines. The most recent three to five years of most journals are not included.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12364517">
              <a id="link_12364517" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12364517,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364517}); ">
               Omnifile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly and non-scholarly journals covering various subjects including general sciences, humanities, social sciences, and business.  Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12364617">
              <a id="link_12364617" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/pilots/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12364617,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364617}); ">
               PILOTS Database
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Citations for scholarly books and articles on post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) and other mental-health consequences of exposure to traumatic events.  Use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12364627">
              <a id="link_12364627" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=pdh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12364627,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364627}); ">
               PsycARTICLES
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals published by the American Psychological Association and allied organizations.  Note that these articles are included in PsycINFO; no need to search PsycARTICLES if you are already searching PsycINFO.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12364702">
              <a id="link_12364702" href="http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sites/entrez?db=PubMed" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12364702,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364702}); ">
               PubMed (Medline)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals in the fields of medicine, psychology, health care, and more.  Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, search the library catalog by journal titles to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12364850">
              <a id="link_12364850" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://online.sagepub.com/cgi/search" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12364850,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364850}); ">
               Sage Journals Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals published by Sage, providing wide coverage in all disciplines, but particularly the social sciences.  Full text for articles published 1999 to the present is linked directly in the database; otherwise, search the library catalog by journal titles to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12364898">
              <a id="link_12364898" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/socialservicesshell/ip?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12364898,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364898}); ">
               Social Services Abstracts
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Citations to scholarly journals in social work, human services, and related areas, including social welfare, social policy, and community development.  Use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12365078">
              <a id="link_12365078" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.springerlink.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12365078,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12365078}); ">
               SpringerLink
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals and books published by Springer-Verlag with coverage from 1997 to present. Subjects covered focus on the natural sciences, but also include significant titles in behavioral sciences, humanities, social sciences and law.  Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, search the library catalog by journal titles or book titles to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10168900">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10168900">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10168900">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Databases for Popular Literature
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10168900">
          <div id="boxatt10168900" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12369560">
              <a id="link_12369560" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12369560,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12369574">
              <a id="link_12369574" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12369574,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12369574}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of popular newspapers, magazines, and broadcast transcripts, as well as business publications, legal materials, and more.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12369606">
              <a id="link_12369606" href="http://www.sciencedaily.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12369606,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Psychology Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Articles'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12369606}); ">
               ScienceDaily
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A web site devoted to science news covering "all fields of the physical, biological, earth and applied sciences. Stories are integrated with photographs and illustrations, links to journals and academic studies, related research and topics, encyclopedia articles, and videos."
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile2894859" class="profile_wrapper">
       <div class="roundbox outerbox">
        <div class="roundbox headerbox">
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
           <td>
            <h2>
             Get Help
            </h2>
           </td>
          </tr>
         </table>
        </div>
        <div class="roundbox innerboxprofile" style="padding:5px;">
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
           <td>
            <div class="profile_image_box" id="profile_image_box_63913">
             <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/profile.php?uid=63913" title="View Profile">
              <img alt="Profile Image" border="0" src="//lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/data/profiles/63913/jarson.jpg" class="profile_image_align profileimage" style="max-width:140px;" />
             </a>
             <div class="profile_display_name">
              Jen Jarson
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="profileh4">
             <div class="profilecontent">
              <b>
               Contact Info
              </b>
              <br />
              jarson@muhlenberg.edu
              <br />
              484.664.3552
              <br />
              <a href="mailto:jarson@muhlenberg.edu">
               Send Email
              </a>
              <br />
             </div>
             <div id="profile_links" class="profilecontent">
              <b>
               Links:
              </b>
              <br />
              <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/profile.php?uid=63913" id="profile_link">
               Profile &amp; Guides
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
           </td>
          </tr>
         </table>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10537009">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10537009">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10537009">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I get the full text of my article?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10536644">
          <p>
           To get the full text of an article, consider the following options:
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you are in Encompass Search or a library database, look for "Check for Full Text buttons," "Access Online," or "Check eResources" buttons. These buttons will take you the full text of the article or tell you that the full text cannot be found. If the full text is not available from Trexler Library, look for buttons to request the item from another library via interlibrary loan. Or go directly to the
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           request forms.
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you have citation information for the article (i.e., journal title, article title, publication year, etc.), type the information about your article in
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/">
            Encompass Search
           </a>
           on the library website. If the library subscribes to the full text, you will be directed to the article (see first bullet above). If not, you can request a copy of the article via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           - If Trexler Library does not have access to the full text of the article, search
           <a href="http://www.google.com/scholar">
            Google Scholar
           </a>
           by article title to see if the author has made a copy freely available online. If not, you can request a copy of the article via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10536644" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
